孨字的基本解释

孨
zhuǎn
谨慎。
弱，懦弱。
孤儿。

孨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuǎn］
［《廣韻》旨兖切，上獮，章。］
(1)弱小。后作“孱”。
(2)懦弱；谨顺。后作“孱”。
(3)孤儿。
(4)孤露可怜。
[②]［nì］
［《廣韻》尼立切，入緝，娘。］
同“孴1”。

孨字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【子字部】　孨； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页279第14
【廣韻】旨兗切【集韻】主兗切，?音剸。【說文】謹也，从三子。【廣韻】孤露可憐也。　又【集韻】以轉切，聲近軟。【正字通】據史漢，吾王，孱王也。韋昭曰：孱，仁謹貌。《方言》冀州人謂懦弱曰孱。孨當與孱通。又《六書統》?與進同義。朱謀㙔曰：羣兒聚弄爭先，因其弱而不前者，借爲孱弱字。　又【廣韻】莊眷切【集韻】雛戀切，?音饌。義同。

孨字的起名意思

弱小。后作"孱"；懦弱；谨顺。后作"孱"；孤儿；孤露可怜。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhuǎn］
["Guangyun" aims to cut, top, chapter. ]
(1) Weak and small. Later called "孱".
(2) Cowardly; cowardly. Later called "孱".
(3) Orphans.
(4) Lonely and pitiful.
[②]［nì］
["Guangyun" Ni Liqie, wanted, mother. ]
Same as "孴1".

[Yin Ji 1] [Sub Word Department] 　孨; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 279 14
[Guangyun] Purpose Yanqie 【Jiyun】Mainly Yanqie,? Sound. [Said Wen] Sincerely, from the third son. [Guang Yun] Lonely Lu is pitiful.　 [Jiyun] again with a turn and a soft sound. 【Zhengzitong】According to the history of Han, my king, the king of Yi. Wei Zhao said: 孱, benevolent and careful appearance. "Dialects" Jizhou people called cowardly and said 孱. Dangdang and shitong. Also "Liu Shu Tong"? Synonymous with Jin. Zhu Mou 㙔 said: The group of children gathers to compete for the first place, because of its weakness and not the former, borrowed as a weak word.　 [Guang Yun] Zhuang Zhuan cut [Ji Yun] Young love cut,? Sounds. The same meaning.

Name meaning
Weak. Later as "孱"; cowardly; conscientious. Later as "孱"; orphan; lonely and pitiful.
zhuǎn
1) инт. три показателя успешного мужчины (квартира, машина, жена)
从屌丝到孨男 из неудачника в успешного мужчину
2) 谨慎。
3) 弱，懦弱。
4) 孤儿。
